author: Staff Reporter
text:
A bridegroom whose marriage was scheduled for Friday died after accidentally falling into a well here on Wednesday.

The marriage of K. Rajkumar (27), a software engineer, of Vadugapatti village in Sankari was to take place in a temple at Sankari at 5 a.m. on Friday. He left home to visit his agricultural land, but did not return. Parents and relatives searched him and found his footwear outside the well. They suspected that he could have fell into the well. Fire and Rescue Service personnel were informed who rescued his body from the well. Sankari police rescued the body and sent to Government Hospital in Sankari. Post-mortem was done and body handed over to the relatives.
title: Man falls into well, dies
